SUBSCRIPTIONS.TITLE: Abonnements - Profile utilisateur - Taiga
SUBSCRIPTIONS.YOUR_RECOMMENDED_PLAN: Peut-être que vous devriez prendre en compte que
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} private projects + Unlimited public projects!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT_UNLIMITED: Projets privés illimités + Projets publics illimités!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.CONTACT_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to this plan by contacting us at support@taiga.io
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MAX_PRIVATE_PROJECTS: Would you like to add more private projects? Upgrade your plan!

HELP.WHY: Pourquoi nous pensons que cela pourrait être le meilleur plan pour vous?
HELP.NO_PROJECTS: You currently have no private projects so we believe that the  {{name}} plan might work great for you.
HELP.FEW_PROJECTS: You currently have {{private_num}} private projects so we believe that the {{name}} plan might work just fine for you.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the {{plan}} plan might be your best option.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS_CUSTOM: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the Custom plan might be your best option.
HELP.UPGRADE: Il est facile de faire des changements à votre plan actuel et ça peut être fait à tout moment!
HELP.PAYMENT: If you have more than 1 private project and you haven't yet subscribed to a payment plan, your private projects will be temporarily blocked. You don't need to worry, they will not be deleted. Once you confirm a subscription plan, they will become accesible again.
HELP.PUBLIC: Please remember that public projects don't count towards paid plans.

PAYMENT_HISTORY.CHANGE_DATA_SUCCESS: Super! Vous avez changé avec succès vos informations de paiement

PLANS_SELECTOR.TITLE: Quel plan fonctionne le mieux pour vous?
PLANS_SELECTOR.CONTACT: If you need a paid plan allowing for more projects or more members per project contact us at support@taiga.io for further information.

DOWNGRADE.TITLE: Rétrograder
DOWNGRADE.REASON: Unfortunately, you have exceeded the maximum number of private projects allowed by this plan. Your current plan allows up to {{projects}} private projects and {{members}} members per private project. In order to change to the {{plan}} plan, simply have to make the following changes
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS: Si vous avez plus de {{projects}} projets privés
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION1: Have a maximum of {{projects}} private projects and set the remaining projects as public
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION2: Garder {{}} projets des projets privés et <strong> Supprimer </ strong> les projets privés restants
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION3: Ou une combinaison des options ci-dessus
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS: Si vous avez plus de {{members}} membres par projet privé
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS_OPTION1: Have a maximum of {{members}} members for all your private projects

SELECT_PLAN.TITLE: S'abonner à un plan
SELECT_PLAN.TAXES: Selon votre pays, nous pouvons être tenus de facturer la taxe de vente.
SELECT_PLAN.SUCCESS: Congratulations, you successfully subscribed to a payment plan!

BLOCKED_PROJECT.ITS_ONLY_TEMPORAL: Ne vous inquiétez pas, ça devrait être temporaire
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CHECK_YOUR_PLAN: To unblock projects, first subscribe to a payment plan that allows at least as many private projects as you have currently
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CONTACT_SUPPORT: To unblock your projects please contact with support@taiga.io

PROJECT_RESTRICTIONS.PROJECT_MEMBERS_DESC: The project you are trying to import has {{members}} members, unfortunately, your current plan allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per project. If you would like to add more users please contact the administrator at support@taiga.io.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.TITLE: Unfortunately you current setup doesn't allow for more private projects
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.DESC: The project you are trying to import is private, unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow for more private projects. If you would like to raise that limit, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_MEMBERS.TITLE: Your current setup allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per private project

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.TITLE: Unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow you to add more private projects or activate more than  {{max_memberships}} members per private project
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.DESC: Unfortunately, the project you are trying to import contains more than {{max_memberships}} members, which is the maximum allowed by your current setup. If you would like to import projects such as this one, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED: At the moment you cannot become an owner of a project of this type. If you would like to become the owner of this project please contact the administrator at support@taiga.io.
PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED_BY_MEMBERSHIPS: At the moment you won't be able to become an owner of a project of this type. If you would like to become the owner of this project please contact the administrators at support@taiga.io.

MEMBERSHIPS.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER_WI: This project currently has {{members}} members, which is the maximum allowed for the Seed Plan. If you would like to add more members, please consider subscribing to a paid plan.
MEMBERSHIPS.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER: This project currently has {{members}} members, which is the maximum allowed. If you would like to add more members, please contact us at support@taiga.io.

CREATE_MEMBER.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER: You are about to reach the maximum number of members allowed for this project, {{maxMembers}} members. If you need more, please consider a paid plan and if you already have one contact us at support@taiga.io.
